v1   odd      0111
v2   odd      0001
sum  odd  S   1000
diff even     0110

v1   odd      101101001010111011001101110101011110111011101011100111101111111
v2   even     100010000010101100010011011101010101101110110010111001001011011

v1   odd      0010001000001010110001001101110101010110111011001011100100101101
v2   odd      0100010000010101100010011011101010101101110110010111001001011010

v1   odd      10000
v2   odd      10000

diff even   Z 00000

v1   even     00
